title: Wake up Art Cullagh
content:
urgery and Physiology: A Sharran's Primer in a room to the north, the DC is slightly lower. After dealing with Malus and the sisters, take the lute from Malus after completing this step. Return to the Last Light Inn and play the lute for Art. Meet Halsin by the lakeside if he is with you. (Quest Lift the Shadow Curse)
